name: Vinoperfect Dark Circle Brightening Eye Cream with Niacinamide
categories: Skincare, Eye Care, Eye Creams & Treatments
about: What it is:A visibly brightening eye cream clinically shown to reduce the look of all types of dark circles with the power of Viniferine, caffeine, and niacinamide..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dryness, Dullness, and Dark Circles.Formulation:Cream.Highlighted Ingredients:- Viniferine: Is 62X more effective than vitamin C at visibly brightening dark circles..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan and gluten-free..What Else You Need to Know:This visibly brightening, fragrance-free eye cream is shown to reduce the appearance of all dark circles (blue, brown, purple, and black). Powered by Viniferine, it hydrates your eye contour and works as a concealer base. Use the cold ceramic applicator to reduce the look of puffiness..Clinical Results:In a clinical test with 22 volunteers, over 56 days:
ingredients: -Viniferine: Is 62X more effective than vitamin C at visibly brightening dark circles..-Niacinamide: Visibly evens under-eye texture and hydrates..-Caffeine: Visibly awakens and brightens the eye area...Aqua/Water/Eau, Butylene Glycol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Caffeine, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Glucoside, Niacinamide, Triheptanoin, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Squalane, Palmitoyl Grapevine Shoot Extract, Oleic Acid, Glyceryl Caprylate, Cetyl Alcohol, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Carbomer, Terminalia Arjuna Extract, Xanthan Gum, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Tocopherol, Sodium Hydroxide, Lecithin, Sodium Phytate...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply in the morning, before makeup..-Apply in the evening, after your moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who has battled dark circles and puffiness around the eyes for years, I'm always on the hunt for a miracle product. Enter Caudalie Vinoperfect Eye Cream, a much-hyped solution promising to brighten, tighten, and rejuvenate the delicate skin around the eyes. Here's my honest take:  Pros:      Lightweight Texture: The cream glides on smoothly and absorbs quickly, which is great for daytime use under makeup.     Hydration: It does provide a decent level of hydration without feeling greasy or heavy.     Packaging: The sleek tube is hygienic and travel-friendly, making it easy to use on the go.  Cons:      Limited Results: While it claims to target dark circles and brighten the under-eye area, I didn't notice a significant improvement even after consistent use for several weeks.     Price: Considering the somewhat lackluster results, the price point feels steep compared to other eye creams on the market.     Fragrance: Though it's subtle, the fragrance might be a concern for those with sensitive skin or a preference for fragrance-free products.  I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes. #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: Applicator is amazing. I wish all eye creams were like this. The product is so easy to apply. The cream is also very hydrating and moves around well.  Cons: It can be hard to squeeze out the right amount. I find that it's either too little, and it's hard to spread, or it's too much. If you squeeze too much and get it too close to your eyes it will burn. I also find that using too much makes it hard to sink in. It's a VERY thin line between too little and too much.  Overall: It's a good eye cream that gets the job done. It hasn't done anything for my dark circles or fine lines but I wouldn't expect it to. It hydrates my orbital bone area and that's enough for me.  I used this product once a day in the morning. I have normal/dry acne prone skin. I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

Overall, if you're looking to treat yourself to a little eye area refreshment without expecting to totally erase your dark circles, this cream is a solid bet. It's kind of like a nice, gentle hug for your under-eyes. I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Initial impressions ‚Äì I have been plagued with dark circles my entire life, worsened by aging and exhaustion. Needless to say, I was excited to try this product out of Caudalie‚Äôs 3 undereye options (Premier Cru ‚Äì anti-aging, Resveratrol Lift ‚Äì puffiness/firming, Vinoperfect ‚Äì all dark circles).  Ingredients ‚Äì The 3 ingredients hyped up are Viniferine (reduces undereye circles), Niacinamide (hydration), and caffeine (brightens), but it is also free from fragrance, silicone, PEGs, parabens, and mineral oil.  Product applicator ‚Äì even at room temperature, the ceramic applicator tip is a standout feature that has a cooling effect while also ensuring smooth coverage.  Usage and results ‚Äì I found the product to be gentle and refreshing from first use. I have sensitive skin (especially under my eyes) but I did not experience any irritation/stinging/burning. I especially appreciated that it did not prevent the smooth application of makeup, which I have experienced with other undereye creams in the past.  So far, I have used the eye cream 2x/day (AM and PM). Since Caudalie itself claims ‚Äò86% saw their dark circles visibly brightened‚Äô after a 56-day trial, my expectations were managed as far as how long it may take to see results. All that said, after just under a month of consistent usage, I have not YET seen a change that would show a significant difference in pictures (since I find that to be a good way of monitoring results for any type of under eye cream). However, I plan to continue to use it because I want to give my skin the full length of recommended time. I also just genuinely like the way the product feels ‚Äì it has a unique combination of feeling like it both tightens AND hydrates, first when being applied and then upon absorption.  For those reasons alone, I would recommend trying it, with the caveat that it is not a magic eraser for undereye circles (but nothing is!). I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this product in March, so about a month ago. Now, I'm a 23-year-old graduate student who runs on minimal sleep; my eye bags are bad for my age. Further, without concealer, I quite literally look like I was punched in the face and have two black eyes. I have been desperate to find a product that works for me. After trying many eye cream products, I incorporated this into both my morning and evening skincare routines. The product has no odor, no residue, and is applied with ease. I used the built-in applicator to apply it which provides a nice cooling sensation. I am absolutely horrid at taking pictures of my eyes, so please take my word for it when I say this product has truly had such a positive benefit on my eye bags. The appearance of my eye bags is FAR reduced, and my concealer actually covers everything now. I feel confident leaving my house without makeup now, because before this product people would ask me if I was sick from how miserable I looked! If you're someone like me who even the fullest coverage of concealers can't cover up your bags, I would HIGHLY recommend giving this a try. I know the price is steep, but I will absolutely be purchasing again after I run out. I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this eye cream twice daily for the past month I believe I have finally found my holy grail eye cream. I have very dry under eyes with extremely thin skin. I also suffer from severe dark circles that make me look constantly tired and much older than the rest of my face. This cream gave me almost immediate results making my skin look hydrated and smooth and making my dark circles less noticeable every time I use it. It has taken years off my appearance by making me look well rested and making my eyes hydrated and moisturized. Most eye creams make my eyes even drier and leave me with dry patches under my eyes. this one gives me a nice healthy glow from within appearance without a trace of dryness.      It's a lovely lightweight formula that's silky smooth and absorbs almost immediately. There is no sticky feeling and it gives me a beautiful base for applying my makeup with no pilling whatsoever. I love the applicator. I keep mine in the fridge and it's so refreshing in the morning. It wakes my eye area up and makes me look well rested. The ceramic tip makes the product glide on smoothly. The moisture and hydration lasts throughout the day and i haven't had any dry patches since I started using this eye cream. It has a pleasant light fragrance which I enjoy.         I look forward to seeing the results after two months since that's when they say the full effects can be seen. I will definitely be keeping this in my skincare routine. I have discovered the best way to keep your concealer from creasing under your eyes is to improve the eye area so you don't need the concealer! I would highly recommend this to anyone who suffers from dark circles, dry and thin undereye skin or if you feel older because of your undereye appearance. It has top notch ingredients and is clean which I really love .I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

I used this cream in the mornings after washing and exfoliating my face. For whatever unknown reason, I could not get the hang of using the sort of applicator tip of the tube, I could never get the product to go where I wanted it to, and generally just ended up making a mess of things. I decided to just apply a small dot and then work it in gently with my finger instead (haha). Not only was the skin underneath my eyes much brighter and more normal looking, but it also felt hydrated and a lot softer. I also wear glasses, and this cream didn't make any greasy marks or anything on them, which was awesome. I definitely would recommend this product and am so happy to have received it! reviews.review_text: Caudalie's Vinoperfect Eye Cream dives into the world of luxury skincare with the promise of addressing those tricky under-eye concerns that many of us face. Caudalie's Vinoperfect line is renowned for its brightening properties, thanks to the star ingredient, Viniferine, which is derived from grapevine sap. reviews.review_text: As someone constantly looking for skincare solutions that target the delicate under-eye area, I was intrigued to try out the Caudalie Vinoperfect Eye Cream. Dark circles and puffiness have always been my main concerns, and finding an eye cream that effectively addresses these issues while being gentle on the skin can be daunting. However, after incorporating this product into my routine, I can confidently say that it has exceeded my expectations.  Brightening Power: The standout feature of the Caudalie Vinoperfect Eye Cream is its ability to brighten the under-eye area. Enriched with Viniferine, a natural ingredient derived from grapevine sap, this cream effectively reduces the appearance of dark circles, leaving the skin looking noticeably brighter and more radiant. With consistent use, I've seen a significant improvement in my under-eye area's overall tone and luminosity.  Hydration and Nourishment: One of the key benefits of this eye cream is its deeply hydrating formula. Infused with moisturizing ingredients like hyaluronic acid and olive squalane, it provides long-lasting hydration to the delicate skin around the eyes, helping to minimize the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. The lightweight texture absorbs quickly into the skin, leaving it feeling smooth, supple, and refreshed.  Gentleness: I have sensitive skin, particularly around my eyes, so I'm always cautious when trying new products in this area. I'm pleased to report that the Caudalie Vinoperfect Eye Cream is incredibly gentle and non-irritating. It's ophthalmologist-tested and fragrance-free, making it suitable for even the most sensitive skin types. I've experienced no stinging, burning, or redness, which is a huge plus for me.  Reduced Puffiness: In addition to its brightening and hydrating properties, this eye cream also helps to reduce puffiness and refresh tired eyes. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who received the Caudalie Vinoperfect eye cream for testing purposes, I have some honest observations to share  Active Ingredients: The first thing that struck me was the minimal list of active ingredients. Given the product's claims, I expected a more robust formula. Unfortunately, this lack of potency made it hard for me to believe that it could effectively address concerns like dark circles.  Dark Circles and Genetics: Dark circles around the eyes can indeed be influenced by genetics and the depth of our eye sockets. While skincare products can help improve the appearance, it's essential to manage our expectations. The Vinoperfect Eye Cream's claims seemed ambitious in this regard.  Applicator Design: Now, let's talk about the applicator. Instead of a convenient roller ball, the cream comes in a standard squeeze-out tube with a tapered plastic end. Unfortunately, this design dispenses **way too much product**. It's wasteful and frustrating, especially when you're trying to be precise with application.  Formula Disappointment: Considering the minimal active ingredients, the applicator woes, and the product's lofty promises, I would have been genuinely upset if I had purchased this eye cream myself. It falls short of expectations.  As someone who values transparency, I can not promote a product that doesn't live up to its claims. While I appreciate the opportunity to test it, I believe it would be unjust to recommend the Caudalie Vinoperfect eye cream to others due to its price and lack of impressive anti-aging ingredients.Remember, skincare experiences can vary, and what works for one person may not work for another. Personally, I will only purchase eye creams that contain retinol. √íur eyes are the first place to age! Always consider your unique skin type and needs before purchasing products.

Embarking on my quest for an effective solution to combat dark circles, I turned to Caudalie's Vinoperfect Dark Circle Brightening Eye Cream. Infused with niacinamide, this cream intrigued me with its promise of illuminating the delicate under-eye area. Upon consistent use, I was pleasantly surprised to witness a gradual reduction in the appearance of my dark circles, lending a refreshed look to my overall complexion. However, I found the consistency to be slightly thicker than anticipated, requiring a gentle tapping motion for proper absorption. While the results were promising, it's worth noting that patience is key as noticeable improvements took a few weeks to manifest. Despite this, the brightening effect and the nourishing feel make it a worthy addition to any skincare routine, particularly for those battling stubborn dark circles. I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

One aspect I appreciated was its lightweight texture, which absorbed quickly into my skin without leaving any greasy residue. The inclusion of niacinamide intrigued me, as it's known for its brightening properties, and indeed, I noticed a subtle improvement in the darkness under my eyes over time. However, I found that the effects plateaued after a few weeks, and I didn't see a significant difference beyond that point. Additionally, I experienced some sensitivity when using the cream, particularly if I applied it too close to my lash line. While it offers some benefits, its long-term efficacy and potential for irritation may vary from person to person. I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_title: Brightening Eye Cream with Mixed Results
reviews.review_text: Having struggled with dark circles, I eagerly tried out the Caudalie Vinoperfect Dark Circle Brightening Eye Cream with Niacinamide. To its credit, the cream has a lightweight texture that absorbs quickly, making it suitable for daily use under makeup. I noticed a subtle brightening effect after consistent application, which was promising. However, while it helped reduce the appearance of dark circles, the results weren't as dramatic as I had hoped for. Additionally, I found the packaging somewhat cumbersome, making it challenging to dispense the desired amount without wasting product. Overall, while this eye cream offers some benefits, it may not be the ultimate solution for severe dark circles. I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_text: I am a huge Caudalie fan so I was very excited to try this brightening eye cream. Whether it‚Äôs stress, hormones, genetics or the combination of the three I have always had noticeable dark circles. Honestly it just makes my eyes look tired. I‚Äôm sure that we have all used concealer to try and cover the dark circles that will inevitably show through at some point during the day. I hadn‚Äôt found anything that actually faded the dark circles. I have only been using this for about 10 days so I didn‚Äôt expect noticeable results at all. Skin care including eye cream takes time. I must say that for the first time in years I didn‚Äôt have to apply tons of concealer under my eyes! My eyes look brighter, the dark circles are almost completely unnoticeable. This cream is much thinner than premier cru and both are great for different reasons. This has the consistency of a lotion which I love! You barely have to use any at all for coverage. It sinks into your skin very quickly and doesn‚Äôt pill. The way I apply it is with gentle tapping of my middle finger being careful not to pull or tug the delicate under eye area. You can apply it with the applicator but I prefer to use the applicator after I have put it on with my finger. I keep it in the refrigerator and it is cooling and so soothing. This will last a long time and I‚Äôm so excited about my results already! If you are on the fence, buy it! I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes. I've been struggling with dark circles for a while, and decided to try this Caudalie eye cream. I haven't noticed a dramatic difference overnight, but after a few weeks of consistent use, I can definitely see a twinkle back under my eyes! The dark circles appear lighter, especially the blueish ones. My whole eye area seems smoother and more hydrated too. I'm happy with this eye cream and would recommend it to anyone looking to brighten up their tired-looking eyes. It's gentle enough for everyday use and seems to be making a real difference!

reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from topbox circle in exchange for my honest opinion. I have used a lot of eye creams, serums, etc., in the past trying to find one with the right active ingredients that will help waken my tired eyes. When I started using Caudalie Vinoperfect Dark Circle Brightening Eye Cream with Niacinamide, I immediately knew I found my next holy grail! I love the metal applicator for a nice cool application. This is an extraordinary treatment that helps firm, depuff, brighten, and hydrate after just 1 use. I noticed my skin feels brighter and more awake. The texture of the eye cr√®me is very soothing and delicate. I use it in the morning and at night. I pat it onto my skin around the entire eye area, in a gentle circular motion with my ring finger. Its overall formula is so gentle and absorbs seamlessly around my eyes and they look and feel more hydrated while I feel a tingle from it firming. My eyebags have significantly reduced and my dark circles have really started to diminish making my eyes look brighter. I use this twice a day, in the AM and PM, and have no  sensitivity. With makeup, I wait one minute to fully absorb before applying. My makeup then goes on flawlessly without any pilling because my eye is smooth. A little product goes a long way so the pump really helps with applying too much! Ultimately, this has given me a brighter, healthier, energized, looking glow under my eyes and I am enthusiastic about continuing to use this to see ongoing results!

reviews.review_title: Good for moisturizer, not for brightening!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a skincare enthusiast always on the lookout for effective eye creams, I decided to try the Caudalie Vinoperfect Dark Circle Brightening Eye Cream with Niacinamide. However, my experience with this product left much to be desired.  While the brand's reputation for natural ingredients and skincare innovation intrigued me, the results fell short of my expectations. Despite containing niacinamide, known for its brightening properties, the cream failed to deliver noticeable improvements in reducing dark circles or brightening the under-eye area.  One of the main issues I encountered was the consistency of the cream. It felt lightweight upon application, which I appreciated, but it didn't seem to absorb well into the skin. Instead, it left a slightly greasy residue that made it challenging to layer with other products or apply makeup over it.  In terms of hydration, the eye cream provided adequate moisture, but it didn't offer the level of hydration I was hoping for, especially for a product marketed as brightening. Over time, I didn't observe any significant changes in the appearance of my under-eye area, leading me to question the effectiveness of the formula.  Additionally, the packaging, while aesthetically pleasing, was not very practical. The tube design made it difficult to control the amount of product dispensed, often resulting in wastage.  Although the Caudalie Vinoperfect Dark Circle Brightening Eye Cream may work for those with minimal concerns or as a preventative measure, it's unlikely to provide satisfactory results for those seeking targeted treatment for dark circles or significant brightening effects.  In conclusion, while the product isn't necessarily bad, it falls short of delivering the promised results. Given its lackluster performance and relatively high price point, I would recommend exploring other options for addressing dark circles and brightening the under-eye area.

reviews.review_title: A must have for your eyes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Caudalie Vinoperfect Eye Cream and I must say, it has truly been a game-changer for my dark circles. As someone who has struggled with under-eye discoloration for years, finding a product that actually works has been a challenge. However, this eye cream has exceeded all my expectations.  First and foremost, the texture of the cream is incredibly lightweight and absorbs quickly into the skin. It doesn't leave any greasy residue or make my under-eye area feel heavy. I love that I can apply it in the morning before makeup or at night before bed without any issues.  After using the Vinoperfect Eye Cream for just a  week, I noticed a significant improvement in the appearance of my dark circles. They have become noticeably lighter and less prominent. The cream also helps to reduce puffiness, making my eyes look more awake and refreshed.  One of the standout features of this eye cream is its natural ingredients. Caudalie is known for their use of grape-derived ingredients, and this eye cream is no exception. The Viniferine, derived from grapevine sap, is a key ingredient that helps to brighten the under-eye area and reduce the appearance of dark spots. I appreciate that the brand prioritizes using clean and effective ingredients.  Another aspect that sets this eye cream apart is its packaging. The sleek and hygienic tube ensures that the product remains fresh and easy to dispense. A little goes a long way, so the tube lasts for a decent amount of time.  Overall, I highly recommend the Caudalie Vinoperfect Eye Cream to anyone struggling with dark circles or under-eye discoloration. It is a true game-changer and has become an essential part of my skincare routine. Say goodbye to tired-looking eyes and hello to a brighter, more youthful appearance. I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_title: #free product BUT BEST I'VE USED BY FAR FOR MY RED
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Top Box Circle (for free in exchange for my natural and honest review) and boy, am I glad I did! It couldn't have come at a better time. I am in my mid-thirties and when I was coming up as a teenager we just didn't have this whole skin care/makeup trend that we have now. As preteens and teenagers they are getting into it and all I can say is that I am 100% JELLY! I WISH I had taken better care of my skin in my teen and early adult years. Instead I quite literally baked it out in the sun at the pool and the beach and even *cringe* at the tanning salons. This product is a lifesaver if you have been anything like me in your younger years. What I struggle with the most NOW I feel is the redness in my face. I've tried to not wear makeup and just do my skincare routine and let my skin do its thing but I just don't feel comfortable going out daily with basically red skin (mainly my cheek areas: and let someone say something to make me blush - it's OVER. My face is TOTALLY BEAT RED - ALL OVER. Which is why I literally LOVE this product. It has three main ingredients in it: niacinamide (you may also see it called nicotinamide). It's basically just a liquid form of B3 (in this product) and it was pretty much made for me as it's main benefit is to NOT CAUSE SKIN FLUSHING! The next ingredient it has in it is Viniferine - which is a molecule that actually TARGETS and brightens dark spots. It's PERFECT for women like me who LOVE to be outside and even exposed to the sun for long periods of time because it's non-photosensitive! The last ingredient is caffeine. And you may ask well, obviously caffeine is in most kinds of coffee so what could it possibly do for my skin? The answer is it actually reduces blood flow to your skin which in turn makes it appear tighter AND brighter. It has anti-aging properties and can also smooth the appearance of any of those pesky wrinkles that may pop up on ya one day! GO GET THIS PRODUCT. LIKE IMMEDIATELY. üòÇ

reviews.review_title: My dark circles are pretty much gone!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from TopBoxCircle and Caudal√≠e in exchange for my honest review.   Thank you so much for sending me the Brand New Caudal√≠e Vinoperfect Brightening Eye Cream!! **Even though this product was gifted, the review is my own! I am not obligated to give a good review!**  Caudal√≠e Vinoperfect Brightening Eye Cream is absolutely amazing!!  I received this Eye Cream before it was available  online or in stores and I have been testing this product for almost 6 weeks, I use it twice a day, morning and night, and I'm absolutely thrilled with the results!!  This is a very lightweight Eye Cream that comes with a ceramic application tip, that is always cool, to help with puffiness! The Eye Cream itself is a white cream that just melts into skin!! It feels silky and honestly just feels so nice on my skin! It's like a burst of hydration for my under eye area!  I absolutely love that this product is Fragrance Free and Cruelty-Free!! It's also Vegan, so even people with sensitive skin should be able to use this Eye Cream!  Vinoperfect Brightening Eye Cream helps with all shades of dark circles!  It contains great ingredients such as...Viniferine which is stronger than Vitamin C, Niacinamide which has so many skincare benefits and Caffeine which we all know helps to brighten & de-puff!
